recipe.title: Skirt Steak with Chimichurri Sauce
ingredients: 1 1 1/2-pound skirt steak (about 1/2" thick), cut it in half crosswise
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Sprinkle skirt steak lightly with kosher salt and let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes. Pat dry with paper towels and season again with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Build a medium-hot fire in a charcoal grill, or heat a gas grill to high). Cook 3-4 minutes per side until meat is nicely charred and medium-rare.
